issue.title: [Gandiva][UDF] Add a udf for gandiva to extract all named groups.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8445](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8445). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- add a gandiva udf `rex` to extract all named groups from given string
   \* add rex_holder to support above udf
   \* support arrow type of `arrow::map(arrow::utf8(), arrow::utf8())` for gandiva udf output to support above udf
